body: More Torque makes my day better.

after looking at torque's other works on here, I'm convinced this must be an upload of an older doujin. it really feels like torque's artstyle was still developing here, and some of the panels are really rough.
on the other hand, I think the body proportions are very interesting - almost chibi, but not too abstract as to lose its sexiness. torque's later works demonstrate the advantages of this artstyle to much greater effect, seemingly due to their growth as an artist.
you should check out later works, such as #286621, if you're interested in seeing more like this.
I didn't enjoy this , not one bit
